snippet.title: Colorfire Redux - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Play on Itch.io: https://antikore.itch.io/colorfire-redux

This game was so fun to make, started as a side project to rest a little bit from Battle Tea (which henceforth I'll be continuing with an eta around late 2024 or early 2025). This quickly became something much bigger than I expected, and also longer.

The game is free now and will be forever (at least if I don't make a remaster on Steam or something hehe)

Soon I'll be posting the full OST here as well ^^
